For centuries your people have been taught to subjugate their own authority and have delegated their ability to perceive clearly to objective authority structures such as government and religion. All of you have a right to know the truth about the conditions that directly affect you. Unfortunately for you, your governments do not agree with this premise. So as a collective you are quite certainly ill-prepared to meet directly ET visitors, no matter how benign their agenda may be. Part of the reason that many advances have been withheld from the general scientific and public communities is that this knowledge would give individual citizens the power to better direct their own lives, their health, their economic standing and their own protection. If the public had access to such abilities the governments could no longer use such tactics as fear and intimidation to illicit blind obedience. They would lose control over their people and their peoples resources as the people gained control over themselves. So the “official program” lie has been created and perpetuated to keep each of you in the dark, fearful and dependent upon the approval and support of outside authorities.
